title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: The datetime values in the dynamic text item are displayed in a different format compared to the datetime values in the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values in the dynamic text item should be displayed in the same format as the datetime values in the data/text item.
SR:
1. Create a form containing a table that retrieves datetime values.
2. Add a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
3. Set the content for both items to new Date().
4. Save the form.
5. Preview the form.
6. Verify that the datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data/text item are displayed in the same format.
